sentences.en: A programming example of isochronous transmission and asynchronous transmission based on 1394 is given.
sentences.cn: 文章还给出了IEEE1394同步和异步传输的程序代码示例.

sentences.en: At last A test report about bulk transfer and isochronous transfer in high - speed mode is given.
sentences.cn: 最后,给出了高速模式下块传输和同步传输的测试数据.

sentences.en: Finally, the distribution and evolution of reservoir are analyzed within isochronous stratigraphic frameworks.
sentences.cn: 最后在等时地层格架内分析了储层的时空展布.

sentences.en: In the new period, the studies of this issue by scholars both in and out of China are isochronous , with more and more achievements and different voices coming out.
sentences.cn: 进入新时期以来，大陆学者和港台、海外汉学界对这一问题的探索和论证基本上趋于同步了，越来越多的研究成果和不同声音浮出水面。

sentences.en: Isochronous stratigraphic interfaces are one of the most important marks of developing process of a basin.
sentences.cn: 等时性地层界面是沉积盆地成长过程中的主要记录之一.

sentences.en: The center conditions and isochronous center conditions for a class of quasi - analytic systems were investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究了一类拟解析系统的中心条件与等时中心条件.

sentences.en: We can gain the isochronous - modulus curves from the curves of stress - strain ratios.
sentences.cn: 根据岩石蠕变的应力 - 应变比曲线可以近一步分析得到等时模量曲线.

words.tran_cn: [天][气象][物] 等时线；瞬压曲线

trans.tran_en: having the same duration; equal in time
